sentences.en: ‘Any minus points ?’ ‘Well, the engine is rather noisy.’
sentences.cn: “有什么毛病吗？”“嗯，发动机噪音很大。”

sentences.en: Fifteen minus five -- there are only ten days to go now.
sentences.cn: 15天刨去5天, 只剩下10天了.

sentences.en: Five minus three is two.
sentences.cn: 五减三等于二.

sentences.en: He seems to have mistaken a minus for a plus.
sentences.cn: 他似乎把负号误作正号了.

sentences.en: He was minus fifty dollars.
sentences.cn: 他花了五十块钱.

sentences.en: He's keen, but his youth is a minus factor.
sentences.cn: 他非常精明, 但他的年轻却是个不利的因素.

sentences.en: None of these minus points will have been mentioned.
sentences.cn: 这些不利因素都不会被提及。

sentences.en: On the minus side, there is no free back-up service if things go wrong.
sentences.cn: 不足之处是出了问题没有免费的技术支持服务。

sentences.en: One minus one is zero.
sentences.cn: 1减1等于0。

sentences.en: One minus one leaves nought [ zero ].
sentences.cn: 一减一 等于 零.

sentences.en: The aircraft was subjected to temperatures of minus 65 degrees and plus 120 degrees.
sentences.cn: 该飞机经受了零下65 度和零上120度的温度。

sentences.en: The film company collapsed, leaving Chris jobless and minus his life savings.
sentences.cn: 电影公司垮了，克里斯没了工作，也失去了他一生的积蓄。

sentences.en: The payment will be refunded to you minus a small service charge.
sentences.cn: 这笔款项扣除一小笔服务费后将退还给你。

sentences.en: The star's surface temperature is reckoned to be minus 75 degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 这颗恒星的表面温度估计在零下75摄氏度左右。

sentences.en: The statue survived through minus a leg.
sentences.cn: 雕像幸存了下来,缺了一条腿.

sentences.en: The temperature dropped to minus ten degrees centigrade.
sentences.cn: 温度降到摄氏零下十度.

sentences.en: The temperature was minus 30 degrees.
sentences.cn: 气温为零下30度.

sentences.en: Twelve from ten equals minus two.
sentences.cn: 10减去12等于负2.

sentences.en: With the chill factor, it's nearly minus forty here.
sentences.cn: 加上风寒指数, 气温接近零下40度.

phrases.tran_cn: 关闭一声部模式；零下一度

trans.tran_en: used to show that one number or quantity is being  subtract ed  from another

trans.tran_cn: 负的，不利的，略低于某标准的
trans.tran_en: used to talk about a disadvantage of a thing or situation

trans.tran_cn: （表示否定）没有，缺少，（表示运算）减去，（表示数目）在零度以下
trans.tran_en: used to show that one number or quantity is being  subtract ed  from another
